Field Detail

MENU_PATH_SEPARATOR

public static final String MENU_PATH_SEPARATOR
See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

MenuItem

public MenuItem()
Creates a top menu.

MenuItem

public MenuItem(String label)
Creates a new menuitem that serves as holder to other menu items.

Parameters:
label - localizable name assigned to created menuitem. May not contain dots.

MenuItem

public MenuItem(String label,
                Class flowClass)
Creates a new menuitem that starts a new flow (instantiating given class with no-argument constructor) when selected.

Parameters:
label - name assigned to created menuitem. May not contain dots.
flowClass - class of flow.

MenuItem

public MenuItem(String label,
                FlowCreator flowCreator)
Creates a new menuitem that starts a new flow (instantiating it with specified constructor) when selected.

Parameters:
label - name assigned to created menuitem. May not contain dots.
flowCreator - FlowCreator used to create instance of flow to be started.
Method Detail

setSelected

protected void setSelected(boolean isSelected)

addMenuItem

public MenuItem addMenuItem(MenuItem item)
Adds a new MenuItem under this MenuItem.

Parameters:
item - item to add.
Returns:
item added to menu

addMenuItem

public MenuItem addMenuItem(String menuPath,
                            MenuItem item)
Adds a new MenuItem under this MenuItem at given path.

Parameters:
menuPath - path to new menu item. Must be null or empty string for to add MenuItem directly to this MenuItem. Must consist of preceding menu labels separated by dots.
item - item to add into menu.
Returns:
item added to menu
Throws:
NullPointerException - if some of the items on specified menuPath do not exist.

selectMenuItem

public Widget selectMenuItem(String menuPath)
                      throws Exception
Changes the selection in menu.

Parameters:
menuPath - path to select in menu.
Returns:
instance of flow that should be started after activating given selection.
Throws:
Exception - if menuPath is invalid or creation of flow fails.

clearSelection

public void clearSelection()

getLabel

public String getLabel()

isHolder

public boolean isHolder()
Deprecated. 

Since Aranea 1.0.9 all menu items are considered holders. Before that, only items which were not associated with flows were considered holders.

Returns:
true

isSelected

public boolean isSelected()

getSubMenu

public Map getSubMenu()
